summary: A pretty basic mod, that changes the look and feel of the Stormcloak faction.
descriptionHtml:
At this point, a pretty basic mod, that changes the look and feel of the Stormcloak faction. Still kinda a work in progress, just wanted to toss this out there for anyone else looking for a more, medieval crusader look for the Stormcloaks. any Critiques and constructive criticism appreciated.

Stormcloak soldier's armor and helmet were originally the vardis helmet and winterfell curiass borrowed and retextured with permission from Omegared99;

his mods can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/127788/?tb=mods&pUp=1

And the Stormcloak Lords Armor which was originally the hedge knight armor borrowed and retextured with permission from hothtrooper44;

his mods can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3656551/?tb=mods&pUp=1

Thanks a lot you guys for the use of the armors, and thanks to The Wicher 2 folks for making a pretty awesome looking armor.

Recomend you try this mod, and my IV Legion mod with Mygoodeye's WARZONES Mod!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9494

as well as Apollodown's Civil War Overhaul Mod!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37216/?

*UPDATE 4/23/2015*

IN LIGHT OF RECENT EVENTS WITH VALVES VENTURE INTO MONETIZE MODS ON STEAM WORKSHOP, ANY MOD OR MOD AUTHOR WHOM I GAVE PERMISSION TO USE MY ASSETS FOR THEIR MOD ARE NOT PERMITTED TO MONETIZE IT! DMCA CLAIMS WILL BE SUBMITTED AGAINST MODS WHO DO NOT RESPECT MY WISH TO KEEP MY CONTENT FREE.
author: Davis237
